title: OXO Expandable Utensil Organizer
description: Keep your utensils neatly stacked with the OXO Good Grips Expandable Utensil Organizer. The adjustable dividers organize more utensils in less space by allowing them to fit in opposite directions in one compartment. Your utensils stay neatly stacked, even when the drawer is opening or closing. Adjust the location of the dividers to accommodate utensils of different shapes and sizes, or remove the dividers completely for open compartments. The expanded space holds longer tools and gadgets for added storage. To adjust dividers, simply pinch the side walls and slide in or out. The Organizer expands from 9 ¾" to 16 ¼" to fit inside kitchen drawers, and non-slip feet keep the Organizer in place.

asset.author: OXO

transcripts: The days of reaching into a drawer and tumbling through a pile of dangerous forks and knives to get to a single spoon is over. We set out to create an organizer that keeps all your utensils separate and easy to access but also utilizes all your drawer space. The OXO expandable utensil organizer allows you to neatly stack your utensils. The adjustable dividers organize more utensils  in less space by allowing them to fit in opposite directions in one compartment. Adjust the location of the dividers to accommodate utensils of different shapes and sizes. Or remove the dividers completely for open compartments. To adjust dividers, simply pinch the side walls and slide in or out. Your utensils stay neatly stacked even when the door is opening or closing. The expandable side tray holds longer tools and gadgets fro added storage. The organizer expands from nine to three quarter inches to 16 and a quarter inch to fit inside kitchen drawers while non slip feet keep the organizer in place. Here's a good tip, try this organizer in your office bathroom or craft room for office supplies, toiletries, makeup, art supplies, and more.
